title: Vancouver Whitecaps v Los Angeles FC: Sartini hoping to benefit from missing international players
description: Vancouver Whitecaps head coach Vanni Sartini believes the international break will benefit his side ahead of welcoming Los Angeles FC to BC Place this weekend. title: Wales will benefit from Iceland collapse in long term, says Bellamy
description: Wales will benefit from the experience of Friday’s Nations League draw with Iceland despite squandering a 2-0 lead to draw 2-2, believes boss Craig Bellamy. Bellamy’s reign began with a positive return of four points from Nations League matches against Turkiye and Montenegro, but they suffered their first major setback under him on Friday.
